Class tripleplay.ui.Background

Added Methods
Background centeredImage(Image) Creates a centered image background with the specified image.
Background composite(Background[]) Creates a composite background with the specified backgrounds.
Background insetBottom(float) Sets the bottom inset for this background.
Background insetLeft(float) Sets the left inset for this background.
Background insetRight(float) Sets the right inset for this background.
Background insetTop(float) Sets the top inset for this background.
Instance instantiate(Background, IDimension) Instantiates a background at the supplied size.
